73280.affected_area: Abbotsford (Lower Sumas Mountain and Surrounding Areas)
73280.summary: Some customers in the Auguston, Auguston, Lower Sumas Mountain, Lower Ten Oaks, Straiton, Straiton, Sumas Mountain, Sumas Mountain, Sumas Prairie, & Upper Ten Oaks areas of Abbotsford are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
73280.title: Feb 24 - Abbotsford (Lower Sumas Mountain and Surrounding Areas) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
